mapper.insert: insert into t_articletouch ( mid, aid, ctime) values (#{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{aid,jdbcType=INTEGER},now())
mapper.select: select ta.*,a.summary,a.title,a.cover_pic from t_articletouch ta inner join article a on ta.aid=a.id where ta.mid=#{mid} order by ta.ctime desc
mapper.delete: delete from t_articletouch where mid=#{mid} and aid=#{aid}
